programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Jennifer Lawrence. Having survived two Hunger Games, Katniss Everdeen is taken to the underground District 13. programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
programme.desc: Finale to the action adventure series, starring Jennifer Lawrence. programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.sub-title: Action, Romance, Drama, Sci Fi, Thriller ║ 2012 ║ 12
programme.desc: Futuristic action thriller starring Jennifer Lawrence. In annual retribution for a failed uprising in the totalitarian state of Panem, each of 12 districts is forced to select a young boy and girl to take part in a televised fight to the death. programme.title: Breaking News in Yuba County

programme.title: Book Club: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: Four best friends take their book club to Italy for the fun girls' trip they never had. programme.title: Jumanji
programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Fantasy, Drama, Comedy, Children's ║ 1995 ║ PG
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Robin Williams. In 1969, a young boy called Alan gets trapped in the strange jungle world of a magical board game he has unearthed on a building site. Twenty-six years later, two children discover the game and unwittingly unleash its dangerous magic. programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Fantasy, Drama, Horror, Sci Fi ║ 1992 ║ PG
programme.desc: Black comedy starring Meryl Streep, Bruce Willis and Goldie Hawn. In the 14 years since actress Madeline Ashton stole writer Helen Sharp's fiancé, time has not been kind. programme.title: Ali G Indahouse

programme.title: The Glorias
programme.desc: The story of feminist icon Gloria Steinem's itinerant childhood and its influence on her life as a writer, activist and organiser for women's rights worldwide. programme.title: The Guilt Trip
programme.desc: An inventor driving across America to demonstrate his new cleaning product stops off at his mother's house along the way. programme.title: Golda

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: According to legend, Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase and for hundreds of years the nobleman's ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. American patriarch Hiram B Otis moves from Boston into the country pile with his clan. Daughter Virginia makes her displeasure about the move clear and she forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to America. Animated adventure with the voices of Stephen Fry and Hugh Laurie Kim Burdon - Director Robert Chandler - Co director Stephen Fry - Sir Simon de Canterville Emily Carey - Virginia Otis Freddie Highmore - Henry, Duke of Cheshire Hugh Laurie - Grim Reaper Gardener / Swordsman / Mephisto Monster / Old Duke Imelda Staunton - Mrs Umney Meera Syal - Lucretia Otis David Harewood - Hiram Otis Miranda Hart - Algernean Van Finchley Toby Jones - The Reverend Chasuble aka The Vicar.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Director Michael Mann's drama, starring Adam Driver and Jack O'Connell Michael Mann - Director Adam Driver - Enzo Ferrari Penélope Cruz - Laura Ferrari Shailene Woodley - Lina Lardi Sarah Gadon - Linda Christian Gabriel Leone - Alfonso de Portago Jack O'Connell - Peter Collins Patrick Dempsey - Piero Taruffi.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. Biopic, starring Helen Mirren, Zed Josef and Liev Schreiber Guy Nattiv - Director Helen Mirren - Golda Meir Liev Schreiber - Henry Kissinger Camille Cottin - Lou Kaddar Rami Heuberger - Moshe Dyan Lior Ashkenazi - David \Dado\ Elazar.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: According to legend, Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase and for hundreds of years the nobleman's ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. American patriarch Hiram B Otis moves from Boston into the country pile with his clan. Daughter Virginia makes her displeasure about the move clear and she forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to America. Animated adventure with the voices of Stephen Fry and Hugh Laurie Kim Burdon - Director Robert Chandler - Co director Stephen Fry - Sir Simon de Canterville Emily Carey - Virginia Otis Freddie Highmore - Henry, Duke of Cheshire Hugh Laurie - Grim Reaper Gardener / Swordsman / Mephisto Monster / Old Duke Imelda Staunton - Mrs Umney Meera Syal - Lucretia Otis David Harewood - Hiram Otis Miranda Hart - Algernean Van Finchley Toby Jones - The Reverend Chasuble aka The Vicar.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Documentary series offering an eye-opening insight into the working lives of the residents of Brixham, Devon, one of UK's oldest and busiest fishing ports. (1/10).

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Brixham plunders Devon's colourful piracy past, playing host to the annual Pirate Festival. Elsewhere, back at sea, fisherman Nathan sets off in search of 'Black Gold'... (2/10).

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Dreams become a reality when 17-year-old Logan takes to the high seas as an apprentice deck hand. Plus, landlady Pat enjoys a trip down memory lane, recalling the old days. (3/10).

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Competition is fierce as local merchant Robert and wife Kelly open up a fish and chip restaurant. Plus, follow the journey of the turbot as it goes from sea to the dinner plate. (4/10).

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Brixham's fishermen are back on dry land for the annual Trawler Race, a celebration of their relationship with the sea. Pat isn't in the mood for raucous revellers though... (5/10).

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: As Ford unveils his vision for a bold new narrative, Delores comes to terms with who she is, while Maeve sets her plan in motion. (S1, ep 10).

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: The puppet show is over, and we are coming for you and the rest of your kind. Welcome back to Westworld. (S2, ep 1).

programme.desc: Why don't we start at the beginning? (S2, ep 2).

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: There is beauty in who we are. Shouldn't we, too, try to survive? (S2, ep 3).

programme.desc: A visit to his family home brings back bad memories for Nucky, while Jimmy makes a new ally when visiting a veterans' hospital. Strong language/sex/mature themes. (S1, ep 7).

programme.sub-title: Hold me in Paradise ║ S1E8 ║ Subs

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: As Jimmy hunts the gang that shot Eli, criminal mastermind Arnold Rothstein plots to have Nucky Thompson killed. Strong language/violence. (S1, ep 9).

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Having survived an assassination attempt, Nucky plots revenge on the D'Alessio brothers with the help of Chalky White. Sexual scenes. (S1, ep 10).

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: As Agent Van Alden goes off at the deep end, Nucky Thompson struggles to win an election while fighting a gang war. Strong language/sex/mature themes. (S1, ep 11).

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: A clever young gymnast seeks reassurance from Paul following a car accident. But Paul has a sneaky suspicion she has something to hide. (S1, ep 3).

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: The locals decide to raise 150,000 pounds for a memorial commemorating fishermen lost at sea. Plus, Pat considers taking part in a skydive, and the search for scallops begins. (7/10).

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: The tides are turning as Brixham's oldest traditions begin to fade. Pat ponders selling up and visits a clairvoyant, while celebrity chef Mitch Tonks puts on the Crab Festival. (8/10).

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: In Bristol, Alan uncovers a grisly secret at the docks before his journey takes him deep underground in Clifton. He also visits the city's first speakeasy. (3/8).
